 class Address < ApplicationRecord

diff_hunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,25 @@
+require 'normalize'
+
+class ProfilesController < ApplicationController
+
+  def show
+    params.require(:username)
+    params[:secret] ||= ''
+    if client_profile
+      @profile = ClientProfilePresenter.new(client_profile, Normalize.call(params[:secret]))
+    else
+      not_found
+    end
+  end
+
+  private
+
+  def client_profile
+    @client_profile ||= ClientProfile.find_by_username(username)
+  end
+
+  def username
+    Normalize.call(params[:username])
+  end
+
+end
body: This and associated classes are the meat of this PR
